column4: What's the unstable part of Hoary? I loaded it and see  no problems.
unstable as in it changes
I do notice a lot of updates/upgrades daily.
#ubuntu-es
would you check http://www.pastebin.com/276523 and tell me what i need to modify to write to /dev/hda1?
right
you read the documentation?
no, /usr/share/doc/awstats/
I read the doc for awstats and figured out this is probably not the app that I need. Can you recommend a good analyzer for web stats on a remote server? (commercial server)
I don't know what sort of information you want
then why wouldn't you use awstats?  assuming they give you useful logs.
it doesn't care where it is, as long as it has access to the log files
so, find out what it's really called.  dpkg -L awstats | grep bin
came back /usr/lib/cgi-bin
so, you have that there.  now just configure it to look at whatever dir youre going to copy the log files to
So how do I start the progrqam? Does it have a gui?
no, it doesn't havea gui.  I assume it has a config file in /etc/, though.
it's not in ubuntu
wiki.ubuntu.com/RestrictedFormats
X won't start
X is being completly re-done
yes
the packaging is being completly changed (e.g. it's being split into lots and lots of tiny little .debs)
